full_summary:
### Tender Notice 01B46-24-035

**Purchase of Forage Crops**
=====================================================

The Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) is soliciting bids for the purchase of forage crops through the CanadaBuys service provider.

### Project Details

*   **Reference Number:** cb-332-59389722
*   **Solicitation Number:** 01B46-24-035
*   **Publication Date:** May 28, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date and Time:** June 12, 2024, 2:00 pm Eastern Daylight Time
*   **Region of Opportunity:** Newfoundland and Labrador
*   **Region of Delivery:** Newfoundland and Labrador

### Scope of Work

The St. John's Research and Development Centre of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires obtaining offers to perform forage and grain harvesting on its farm for the 2024 season. The scope of work will include:

*   Harvesting forage and grain crops
*   Managing crop maintenance and upkeep

### Pre-Tender Information Session

A pre-tender information session will be held on June 5, 2024, at the St. John's Research and Development Centre. This session is optional but recommended for bidders. During this session, bidders will be able to tour the site and ask questions to the AAFC Contract Officer.

### Bidder Requirements

To bid on this project, bidders must:

*   Be a registered contractor with the Government of Canada
*   Have a minimum of 5 years of experience in forage harvesting and maintenance
*   Meet the specific requirements outlined in the project's technical specifications

### Tender Documents

The tender documents, including the technical specifications and bid form, can be downloaded from the CanadaBuys website. Bidders must submit their bids electronically through the CanadaBuys portal.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact Nicole LeBlanc, AAFC Contract Officer, at Nicole.LeBlanc@agr.gc.ca.

Note: This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) with a competitive and open bidding process. The AAFC reserves the right to accept any proposal in whole or in part, without prior negotiation, and to reject any or all proposals received.
